summary: A color theme inspired by blueprint
name: blueprint.vim
description: This is a color theme inspired by blueprint. It use not-so-dark blue background and not-so-bright white characters, trying to give user a clean, simple and easy to read interface, yet easy to identify different part of your masterpiece codes :)
install_details:
tested for GVIM only

cp it to .vim/colors
and use "colorscheme blueprint" to switch to it, if you want to use it permanently, add "colorscheme blueprint" to your .vimrc file
